Summary: SILENT SPHERE LIKE OBJECT WITH A SOLID MASS REVOLVING/PIVOTING AROUND THE OBJECT.OBJECT WAS BRIGHT ORANGE IN COLOR AND DISAPPEARED INTO THIN AIR
divs: sighting detailssilent sphere like object with a solid lighted mass revolving\pivoting around the object.object was bright orange in color or at least had very bright orange light and disappeared into thin air.very hard to discribe. no sound.not scary just odd\freaky. spotted it while sitting on the deck in the back yard. ran around the front as it moved through the sky towards the front yard.it had disapperaed by the time i got out there. witnessed by b0th myself and my spouse. a first though it was maybe a police helicopter or plane but no way. was dead silent;never seen revolving lights liek that before.. very odd.
